meanings.definition: Relating to an authority or public body
meanings.sent1: The uniform worn by the official person showed their importance.
meanings.sent2: The official announcement came from the government.
meanings.sent3: The official cat in the office was in charge of mouse control.
meanings.sent4: The official stamp on the document made it legally binding.
meanings.sent5: The official badge gleamed in the sunlight, signifying power.

meanings.definition: A person holding a position of authority or responsibility
meanings.sent1: The official greeted everyone with a warm smile.
meanings.sent2: The company's official ensured all tasks were completed on time.
meanings.sent3: The official at the zoo had to deal with a monkey business issue.
meanings.sent4: The official of the team led them to victory with strategic decisions.
meanings.sent5: The official's presence commanded respect in the room.

meanings.definition: Approved or authorized by an authority
meanings.sent1: The official document had the necessary signatures.
meanings.sent2: Only official permits were allowed for entry into the event.
meanings.sent3: The official cookies were the only ones approved for the bake sale.
meanings.sent4: The official version of the story was finally released to the public.
meanings.sent5: The official seal on the letter indicated its authenticity.
